datafield.subfield: 338 linear feet, 10 oversize volumes, 9 oversize folders and 1.8 GB.

Dean's files, including minutes of executive committee; records of subordinate administrative officers (including David Bachrach, Alexander Barry, George DeMuth, Robert A. Green, Thomas Herrmann, Walter G. Rice, James A. Taren, , and Charles Votaw); faculty records, including minutes of faculty and executive faculty meetings; and collected historical materials, 1850-1949.
Finding aid via World Wide Web at URL: http://quod.lib.umich.edu/cgi/f/findaid/findaid-idx?c=bhlead&idno=umich-bhl-87253
Detroit College of Medicine and Surgery.
Michigan Association for Regional Medical Programs.
Michigan Coordinating Council for Public Higher Education.
Committee to Consider the Location and Sponsorship of the Expansion of Medical Education.
St. Joseph Mercy Hospital (Ann Arbor, Mich.)
